title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web)”
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Community-enhanced Node CLI for interactive chat, prompt templates, and conversation history.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: chatbot-ui-ollama
summary: Next.js chat UI (like ChatGPT) pre-configured to talk to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style autosuggestions powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embeddings; includes ready-to-use DI extensions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to answer questions via Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama REST API covering generate, chat, embed, and model ops.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to MCP clients (Claude Desktop, etc.).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summaries and Q&A on your vault notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama for scalable local inference with autoscaling replicas.
